message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000. This is a great deal, considering its value to me is no less than $15000. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $12000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $17000. This is still a great deal, considering its value to me is no less than $15000. What do you think?
I'm still very interested in the product, but I really need to stay within my budget. I'm willing to go up to $15000, but I don't think I can go any higher than that. Can you meet me at $15000?

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer to try to meet you in the middle. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $16000. This is the best I can do, considering its value to me is no less than $15000. What do you think?
